name: LightShield
description:
Hyperlight technology changed the world. It's reactors generate huge amounts of power and complex, powerful drones have been made possible. However, a hacking in their system made them hostile. Only cyberforces, specially trained professionals,  can defeat them. 

You awake in cyberforces volunteers training room. It's time to train and fight back the evil.

Gameplay consists of blocking the right color projectiles with the right shield, projectile, when stopped by the right shield, will transform into the opposite color energy, which can be unleashed upon the enemies.
